# AVRoutePickerViewButtonStyle.custom

**Case**

A custom button style.

## Declaration

```swift
case custom
```

## Discussion

Use this button style to customize the background view and focus appearance for a route picker view.

## Button Styles

- **AVRoutePickerViewButtonStyle.plain**: A plain button style.
- **AVRoutePickerViewButtonStyle.system**: A system-defined button style.
title: AVRoutePickerViewButtonStyle.custom
